titleNullable: Russian Invasion of Ukraine | Live News Dataset
subtitleNullable: Live News Dataset Chronicles of the Russian Invasion of Ukraine
descriptionNullable:
## Click on the image to get more information about how to help the people of Ukraine ⬇️ The attention of the whole world is still focused on the events taking place in Ukraine, and many international sources of information cover them. However, different media resources can view the same news from different points of view, depending on the type of audience, the political orientation of the news source, the degree of freedom of speech, and other factors. This dataset consists of news messages from verified [Telegram](https://telegram.org/) channels of selected news media. This dataset allows the researchers to analyze the opinions, sentiments & general insights from the news sources on the different sides of the conflict. The date of the first message in the dataset is the **24th of February 2022** - the beginning of the Russian full-scale invasion of Ukraine. Inside the dataset, you'll find many kinds of information highlighting the events during the war, from propaganda to witness interviews. There are two languages in the dataset: **Russian & English**. The dataset is **updated weekly on Monday**.
**The following News Sources are present in the dataset:**
News Source Telegram channel link # messages
BBC Russia https://t.me/bbcrussian 24,112
Meduza https://t.me/meduzalive 32,710
Novaya Gazeta https://t.me/novaya_pishet 3,453
RBK https://t.me/rbc_news 31,995
RIA News https://t.me/rian_ru 55,012
TASS https://t.me/tass_agency 83,743
Shocked Ukraine https://t.me/ukrainavshoke_repost 17,821
Ukraine Now https://t.me/u_now 58,192
Ukraine24 https://t.me/ukraina24tv 20,593
UNIAN https://t.me/uniannet 55,179
The New York Times https://t.me/nytimes 1,802
Washington Post https://t.me/washingtonpost 2,277
